methods.name: getHighlights
methods.comment: Returns the highlights for the given text

params.name: field
params.comment: the field that is requesting the highlight

params.name: text
params.comment: the text to be considered for highlighting

params.name: cursorTextOffset
params.comment:
the position in the given text of the cursor. A -1 indicates the
 		  cursor is not in this field.

return.comment: an array of highlights to be rendered
